title: Something Probably Happened In 1949, Probably

fields.name: Abilties:
fields.value: - Come up with an ability based on something that happened in the year 1949. With host approval, you may use that ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You have two Basic autovests, because I said so.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the Town lose the game, probably

desc:
Post 1949
*1949 (MCMXLIX) was a common year starting on Saturday of the Gregorian calendar, the 1949th year of the Common Era (CE) and Anno Domini (AD) designations, the 949th year of the 2nd millennium, the 49th year of the 20th century, and the 10th and last year of the 1940s decade.*
